categories: Category:Star Wars: The High Republic young-reader books

nodes.text: The High Republic: Showdown at the Fair

The High Republic: Showdown at the Fair is a forthcoming book by George Mann. It is scheduled to be published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on October 5, 2021 and will be part of the multimedia project Star Wars: The High Republic.

The Republic Fair has come to the planet Valo, and everyone is celebrating. Until the dreaded Nihil launch a surprise attack and Burryaga the Wookiee and the other Jedi of the High Republic must save the day!
